testcase.name: User edits the required fields
testcase.system-out: Given user goes to the login page...........................................passed When user enters username and password......................................passed Then user should login......................................................passed When user edits required fields and clicks on save..........................passed Then user should see an edited contact......................................passed

testcase.name: User edits non required fields
testcase.system-out: Given user goes to the login page...........................................passed When user enters username and password......................................passed Then user should login......................................................passed When user edits non required fields and clicks on save......................passed Then user should view an edited contact.....................................passed

testcase.name: User does not edit any fields
testcase.system-out: Given user goes to the login page...........................................passed When user enters username and password......................................passed Then user should login......................................................passed When user does not edit any field and clicks on save........................passed Then user should view an non edited contact.................................passed When user does not edit any field and clicks on cancel......................passed Then user should see an non edited contact..................................passed
